description: Government ministers will face five urgent questions about their response to the airline's demise.
title: Flybe: Isle of Man ministers to be quizzed on airline's collapse
title_page: Flybe: Isle of Man ministers to be quizzed on airline's collapse - BBC News
maintext: Mr Callister, who has tabled three of the questions, said: "Loganair has already stepped in and filled 16 spaces and that included the Channel Islands, so the question is why has the Isle of Man not been proactive in that period since January, when the first bailout was achieved?
